abstract: Cara Buckley The Carpetbagger column ruminates over Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences effort to promote shorter, more substantive acceptance speeches by letting winners thank people in news crawl-style list of names across bottom of television screen.

headline.main: Oscar Producers Try an End-Run Around Endless Thank-Yous

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Acceptance speeches would be accompanied by names crawling across the bottom of the screen. The nominees have to submit their lists in advance.
